data.title: Four O’clock at the Movies
data.meta_description: Lifelong Learning favorite Elaine Newton returns with an all-new Four O’clock at the Movies series. At each session, Newton discusses the best new movies coming to theaters this season, followed by audience discussion.
data.text:
Film to be announced

Monday, December 2, 2024, 4pm

Tuesday, December 3, 2024, 4pm

Daniels Pavilion

Elaine Newton, Professor Emeritus of Humanities at York University, Toronto

The films chosen for Four O’clock at the Movies are decided month-to-month, so films will be announced throughout the season. Check back here often for the title of the film this lecture will discuss.
